explanation: [0-0] A young woman in a white shirt, gray tie, and gray skirt stands beside a park bench, her long black hair flowing, a smile on her face. In front of her is a small pot of greenery, and behind her are many tall trees in the distance.

[0-8] The woman smiles and runs to the greenery in front, then squats down, picks up the plant pot, and takes a bite out of it, her mouth open. She then extends her thumb, covered in chocolate crumbs, revealing that the plant is made of chocolate. Some chocolate crumbs fall onto the bench. The scene then switches to a gloved hand holding a large piece of chocolate, placing it on a wooden board, and then stacking another layer of chocolate on top. Another hand, holding a knife, cuts into the chocolate, creating chocolate shavings.

[8-18] The scene then cuts to an induction cooker with a black pot on it. Two hands pour water from a bowl into the pot and then place the bowl inside. A bowl of chocolate chips is then poured into the bowl in the pot. One hand holds the bowl while the other stirs the chocolate with a white spatula. The chocolate is completely melted into a chocolate sauce. The scene changes to a person sitting at a table, holding a white cup. Two hands pour the melted chocolate sauce into the cup. The scene then shows the chocolate sauce being poured back from the cup into the bowl. The scene changes again to the cup coated with a layer of chocolate sauce, and a hand pushes the paper cup away. Next, the scene switches to a person holding the chocolate sauce-coated cup. In the following scene, a pair of gloved hands peel off the white paper cup outside the chocolate sauce, revealing the chocolate cup, and then use a brush to brush a layer of chocolate powder on the outside of the cup.

[18-28] The scene changes to a young woman sitting at a table. She holds a bowl in her right hand and pours milk from a carton with her left hand, then adds some white sugar. The scene then cuts to one hand holding the mixture of milk and sugar while the other stirs with a whisk until it becomes whipped cream. Next, the chocolate cup is placed on a table, and two hands squeeze the cream into the cup. Then, a pair of hands tears open a package of Oreo cookies. In the following scene, a person sits at a table with a bowl on it, and many Oreo cookies fall from above into the bowl and onto the table. Next, a person uses both hands to crush the cookies in a plastic bag, then takes out a rolling pin to crush them, and finally uses both fists. The cookies turn into cookie crumbs. The scene then cuts to the cookie crumbs being poured into the chocolate cup. In the final scene, a person inserts a sprig of greenery into the finished chocolate cup.
